betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I have been ignoring this for too long, but it is time to start addressing the issue with the World Soul of the Abyss. The spread of the flesh plague outside of the Shyre territory may become an actual issue, now that the stakes seem to have raised.
As for the soul of Vibe, it should be possible to summon it in a contained form, and to face it directly.
Unlike my prior encounter, though, this enemy has not been weakened by the sacrifice of powerful wizards...
